title: New: The 1975 – Chocolate
body:
Adorably sleazy Manchester group **The 1975** finally appear to be taking over the world, after what seems like years of name changes, re-releases and hiccups.

Newest single _Chocolate_ is slightly seedy pop at it’s very best, complete with jerky guitar riff and anthem written all over it. Taken from their upcoming third EP _**Music For Cars**_, _Chocolate_ was premiered via Zane Lowe earlier last week, check it out below, as well as their [tour dates here](http://the1975.com/tour).
